Evolution of NFT Platforms Web3 Social Impact Protocol

NFTs are implemented on blockchains using smart contracts. Each token minted on the blockchain protocol carries unique information called Metadata.

Therefore, NFT platforms or the NFT marketplace cannot be centralized. However, the founders of the blockchain protocol have sovereignty over decisions such as launching features on the blockchain, establishing rules, and unveiling upgrades.

How can DAO-enabled NFT platforms Benefit Users?

The NFT market has been growing rapidly in recent years, with sales reaching over $2 billion in 2021 alone. Our startup aims to tap into this emerging market by creating a unique and innovative collection of NFTs that will attract buyers and investors alike.

Introduction

We will create a collection of 10,000 unique NFTs and even more interesting ones of our creative inventions and each of them will be represented as different characters in our fictional world.

NFT stands for and stands for non-fungible token (crypto). The meaning of which is that the created product will have no analogues and will be the only one in the whole world and irreplaceable.

Earn Now

Our business model is based on the sale of NFTs and the development of a marketplace for NFTs. We will offer a wide range of services, including the creation of NFTs, the sale of NFTs, and the development of a marketplace for NFTs. We will also provide educational resources to help our customers understand the technology and the potential of NFTs.

Our entire collection will then be represented by 10,000 unique NFTs, and here we can create with even more possibilities and add even more NFTs and many more valuable creations, each representing a different character in our fictional world. Overall, our precious creations of NFTs, each NFT character has its own story and personality, creating a rich and immersive experience for shoppers. The collection is designed to be highly collectible, with rare and valuable NFTs that appreciate over time

Our revenue model is based on the sale of our NFTs. We will sell each NFT at a fixed price, with prices ranging from 0.04 ETH to 0.15 ETH, depending on the rarity and value of the NFT. Sales will be the first success, then we want to master the directions of virtual-real business as a whole, with our modern deep visions, and join the meta space, be in the metaverse, indbox and decentralex, and so on, move forward with rapid development, of course, innovations are happening right here.

Our team consists of experienced entrepreneurs and NFT enthusiasts with a deep understanding of the market. Our team includes and select marketing team a CEO, CTO, COO, and Creative team, each with a proven track record of success in their respective fields. We also have a team of developers, designers, and marketers who will help us execute our vision and bring our collection to market.

Collaborations and Partnerships

Muurcoin is actively seeking partnerships with B2B enterprises and platforms to expand its applications. These collaborations aim to develop tailored blockchain solutions that meet specific industry needs, ranging from manufacturing and logistics to finance and retail.

A global distributed community

We support the advancement of DAOs and decentralized governance solutions in all geographies and industries. Be part of this revolution.
